topic: Large Language Model Security and Privacy Research

  entities:

    Robin Staab|Researcher
    Jie Huang|Researcher
    Siwon Kim|Researcher

  proposition: Artgpt-4 is an artistic vision-language understanding model with adapter-enhanced minigpt-4.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Artgpt-4|DESCRIBED_BY|artistic vision-language understanding model
    Artgpt-4|FEATURE|adapter-enhanced minigpt-4

  proposition: Jinyuan Jia, Hongbin Liu, and Neil Zhenqiang Gong identified 10 security and privacy problems in large foundation models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Jinyuan Jia|RESEARCH_FOCUS|security and privacy problems
    Hongbin Liu|RESEARCH_FOCUS|security and privacy problems
    Neil Zhenqiang Gong|RESEARCH_FOCUS|security and privacy problems

  proposition: Michael Duan et al. investigated membership inference attacks on large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Michael Duan|RESEARCH_FOCUS|membership inference attacks

  proposition: Jiawen Shi et al. explored security vulnerabilities of ChatGPT through backdoor attacks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Jiawen Shi|RESEARCH_FOCUS|security vulnerabilities
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Jiawen Shi|STUDIED|ChatGPT

  proposition: Jiashu Xu et al. discovered backdoor vulnerabilities in instruction tuning for large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Jiashu Xu|RESEARCH_FOCUS|backdoor vulnerabilities

  proposition: Haoran Wang and Kai Shu developed a backdoor activation attack using activation steering for safety-alignment.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Haoran Wang|RESEARCH_FOCUS|backdoor activation attack
    Kai Shu|RESEARCH_FOCUS|backdoor activation attack

  proposition: Robin Staab et al. investigated privacy violation through inference with large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Robin Staab|RESEARCH_FOCUS|privacy violation

  proposition: Jie Huang et al. examined whether large pre-trained language models leak personal information.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Jie Huang|RESEARCH_FOCUS|personal information leakage

  proposition: Siwon Kim et al. developed ProPILE to probe privacy leakage in large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Siwon Kim|RESEARCH_FOCUS|privacy leakage
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Siwon Kim|DEVELOPED|ProPILE

topic: Gender Bias in Language Models

  entities:
    Naomi Ellemers|Researcher
    Jieyu Zhao|Researcher
    Flor Miriam Plaza del Arco|Researcher
    Yixin Wan|Researcher

  proposition: Naomi Ellemers published a study on gender stereotypes in the Annual Review of Psychology.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Naomi Ellemers|RESEARCH_FOCUS|gender stereotypes
    Naomi Ellemers|PUBLISHED_IN|Annual Review of Psychology

  proposition: Jieyu Zhao et al. evaluated gender bias in coreference resolution.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Jieyu Zhao|RESEARCH_FOCUS|gender bias in coreference resolution

  proposition: Flor Miriam Plaza del Arco et al. found that large language models reflect gendered stereotypes in emotion attribution.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Flor Miriam Plaza del Arco|RESEARCH_FOCUS|gendered stereotypes in emotion attribution

  proposition: Yixin Wan et al. identified gender biases in LLM-generated reference letters.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yixin Wan|RESEARCH_FOCUS|gender biases in reference letters

topic: Hallucination Research in Language Models

  entities:
    Josh Achiam|Researcher
    Ziwei Ji|Researcher
    Lei Huang|Researcher
    Yue Zhang|Researcher

  proposition: Josh Achiam et al. published the GPT-4 technical report.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Josh Achiam|PUBLISHED|GPT-4 technical report

  proposition: Ziwei Ji et al. conducted a survey of hallucination in natural language generation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Ziwei Ji|RESEARCH_FOCUS|hallucination in natural language generation

  proposition: Lei Huang et al. published a survey on hallucination in large language models, exploring principles, taxonomy, challenges, and open questions.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Lei Huang|RESEARCH_FOCUS|hallucination in large language models

  proposition: Yue Zhang et al. produced a survey on hallucinations in large language models, metaphorically described as "Siren's Song in the AI Ocean".
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yue Zhang|RESEARCH_FOCUS|hallucinations in large language models
    Yue Zhang|DESCRIBED_BY|"Siren's Song in the AI Ocean"
